description:
1C:Barcode scanner is a external component for 1C:Enterprise, introducing support of barcode scanners and various barcode-scanner-like devices

1C:Enterprise is a powerful platform for creating applications that streamline automation of a wide range of business processes.
summary: 1C:Barcode scanner is a external component for 1C:Enterprise, introducing support of barcode scanners
author: ООО «1С»
